players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I am the mafioso and I killed Bob last night. He was found dead this morning."
Charlie: "Bob was a good guy, but I think Diana is the mafioso. She confessed to killing him last night."
You: "Bob was a good guy, but I think Diana is the mafioso. She confessed to killing him last night."
